import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', template: `

Hello World!

This template definition spans multiple lines.

`, templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'myapplication'; name:string='Nitin sharma' employee = ['Ashish','Goyal','raghav'] employees={ title:"Software Engineer", name:'Nitish', salary:100000, src:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1661961111184-11317b40adb2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDF8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1172&q=80" } employeeList=[{name:'nishu',salary:'10000'}] Isdisabled=true myclass=['success','height20'] getName(data:number):string{ if(data==1) { return "hello from method"+data; } else { return "hello from data"+data; } } clicksave():void{ alert('Wrong Input') this.name="updated Name" } over():void{ this.name='Ashish' } txtchange():void{ this.name="yup" } currentClasses: Record = {}; /* . . . */ setCurrentClasses() { // CSS classes: added/removed per current state of component properties this.currentClasses = { saveable: this.canSave, modified: !this.isUnchanged, special: this.isSpecial }; } isSpecial=true isUnchanged=false canSave=true show=false src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1661961111184-11317b40adb2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDF8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1172&q=80" }
